amendment.description: To extend the expiration of the Herger-Feinstein Quincy Library Group Act of 1998.

vote.text: Amendment SA 47 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 47 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S1431-1433; text: CR S1432) To extend the expiration of the Herger-Feinstein Quincy Library Group Act of 1998.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 47 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 47 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Feinstein.
